actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Armed Services.
Executive Comment Requested from Selective Service Comm, DOD.
Referred to Subcommittee on Military Personnel and Compensation.

committees.subcommittee: Subcommittee on Military Personnel and Compensation

official_title: A bill to amend the Military Selective Service Act to provide that retired members of the Armed Forces may serve as members of local boards of the Selective Service System.

summary.text: Amends the Military Selective Service Act to permit persons receiving military retirement or retainer pay (or certain persons under the age of 60 who would otherwise be entitled to military retirement pay) to serve on local Selective Service System boards.

titles.title: A bill to amend the Military Selective Service Act to provide that retired members of the Armed Forces may serve as members of local boards of the Selective Service System.
